oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (KWTX) - 1946-08-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show for KWTX, Waco, TX sponsored by Frontier Jewelers. Originally broadcast 1946-08-29 (unconfirmed, year based on performances and mention of 'Night Train To Memphis', month based on Hank's mention of 'Thursday the 29th', suggesting August for the year of 1946), though Hank's comments suggest the program was recorded a day in advance of broadcast. Hank mentions he is to appear with Eddy Arnold that evening in Temple, Texas. Announcer referred to as Bob, likely Robert Charles (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- Opening statement (Robert Charles) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- Rocks And Gravel (Hank Thompson) -- Frontier Jewelers commercial (Robert Charles) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Night Train To Memphis (Hank Thompson) -- Frontier Jewelers commercial (Robert Charles) -- Hank Thompson talks -- What Good Will It Do (Hank Thompson) -- Robert Charles and Hank Thompson announce his appearance schedule -- A Picture On The Wall (Hank Thompson) -- Frontier Jewelers commercial (Robert Charles, Hank Thompson) -- Cindy (Hank Thompson) -- Frontier Jewelers commercial (Robert Charles) -- Closing statement (Robert Charles) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KWTX (Radio station : Waco, Tex.); Thompson, Hank; Charles, Robert (Announcer)
